## Description of the original paper

In "Abortion laws reform may reduce maternal mortality: an ecological study in 162 countries," Latt, Milner and Kavanagh present the results of a study that aims to assess whether maternal mortality is affected by the flexibility of abortion laws. 


##  The causal design of the original paper


```{r}
dag  <- dagify(MMrates ~ laws,
               MMrates ~ GDP,
               MMrates ~ literacy,
               laws ~ GDP,
               laws~literacy
               )
ggdag(dag) +  theme_dag_blank()
```








# References

## Original Paper
- Latt, S.M., Milner, A. & Kavanagh, A.(2019) Abortion laws reform may reduce maternal mortality: an ecological study in 162 countries. BMC Women's Health 19, 1. https://doi.org/10.1186/s12905-018-0705-y
